text: Uri Zohar () (4 November 1935 â€“ 2 June 2022) was an Israeli movie director, actor and comedian who later became an Orthodox rabbi. Zohar was born in Tel Aviv, Israel. His entertainment career lasted from 1956 to 1988. His best known movies were Hole in the Moon, Three Days and a Child, Every Bastard a King, Big Eyes and Metzitzim. Zohar died on 2 June 2022 from a heart attack at his home in Jerusalem, Israel at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Rabbis from Tel Aviv Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli stage actors Category:Movie directors from Tel Aviv Category:Comedians Category:Actors from Tel Aviv
title: Uri Zohar
